languages.text: "Я бы сам лично во всем разобрался, если бы вы не решили вмешаться", {n}— ворчливо заявляет Абеляр.{/n} "Вспомните Лорд-капитана Теодору. Думаете, она хоть раз поставила туфельку на нижние палубы? Нет. Такими делами ведал я и младшие офицеры, пока она была занята большими планами — как и положено истинному стратегу и {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Вольному Торговцу{/g}".

traits.locale_text: "Я бы сам лично во всем разобрался, если бы вы не решили вмешаться", {n}— ворчливо заявляет Абеляр.{/n} "Вспомните Лорд-капитана Теодору. Думаете, она хоть раз поставила туфельку на нижние палубы? Нет. Такими делами ведал я и младшие офицеры, пока она была занята большими планами — как и положено истинному стратегу и {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Вольному Торговцу{/g}".
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "I would have handled the situation myself had you not decided to intervene," {n}Abelard says irascibly.{/n} "Remember Lord Captain Theodora. Do you think she ever set one slippered foot on the lower decks? No. She did not. Such matters were left to myself and the junior officers while she dedicated herself to her grand designs for the protectorate — as any true strategist and {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g} ought."
languages.original_text: "Я бы сам лично во всем разобрался, если бы вы не решили вмешаться", {n}— ворчливо заявляет Абеляр.{/n} "Вспомните Лорд-капитана Теодору. Думаете, она хоть раз поставила туфельку на нижние палубы? Нет. Такими делами ведал я и младшие офицеры, пока она была занята большими планами — как и положено истинному стратегу и {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Вольному Торговцу{/g}".

traits.locale_text: "I would have handled the situation myself had you not decided to intervene," {n}Abelard says irascibly.{/n} "Remember Lord Captain Theodora. Do you think she ever set one slippered foot on the lower decks? No. She did not. Such matters were left to myself and the junior officers while she dedicated herself to her grand designs for the trade empire — as any true strategist and Rogue Trader ought."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

Do you think she ever set one slippered foot on the lower decks? No. She did not. Do you think she ever set one slippered foot on the lower decks? No. She did not. Such matters were left to myself and the junior officers while she dedicated herself to her grand designs for the protectorate — as any true strategist and {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g} ought."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: “如果不是您决定亲自插手，我现在已经把这个问题处理掉了。”{n}阿贝拉德暴躁地回答道。{/n}“别忘了西奥多拉领主舰长，您觉得她踏足过底层甲板吗？不，她从来没有过。所有类似的事情，她都交给我和下级军官负责处理，而她则专心致志地规划着她的王朝。这才是真正的战略家，真正的{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}行商浪人{/g}该做的事情。”
languages.original_text: "I would have handled the situation myself had you not decided to intervene," {n}Abelard says irascibly.{/n} "Remember Lord Captain Theodora. Do you think she ever set one slippered foot on the lower decks? No. She did not. Such matters were left to myself and the junior officers while she dedicated herself to her grand designs for the protectorate — as any true strategist and {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g} ought."

traits.locale_text: “如果不是您决定亲自插手，我现在已经把这个问题处理掉了。”{n}阿贝拉德暴躁地回答道。{/n}“别忘了西奥多拉领主舰长，您觉得她踏足过底层甲板吗？不，她从来没有过。所有类似的事情，她都交给我和下级军官负责处理，而她则专心致志地规划着她的王朝。这才是真正的战略家，真正的{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}行商浪人{/g}该做的事情。”
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: «Me habría encargado de la situación yo mismo si usted no hubiera decidido intervenir». {n}Abelard responde en tono irascible.{/n} «Recuerde a la Lord Capitán Theodora. ¿Cree que llegó a poner un solo pie en las cubiertas inferiores? No. Nunca. Dejaba esos asuntos a mi cargo y al de los oficiales más inexpertos mientras ella se dedicaba a progresar en sus grandes proyectos para el protectorado, como debería hacer todo buen estratega y {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Comerciante Independiente{/g}».
languages.original_text: "I would have handled the situation myself had you not decided to intervene," {n}Abelard says irascibly.{/n} "Remember Lord Captain Theodora. Do you think she ever set one slippered foot on the lower decks? No. She did not. Such matters were left to myself and the junior officers while she dedicated herself to her grand designs for the protectorate — as any true strategist and {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g} ought."

traits.locale_text: «Me habría encargado de la situación yo mismo si usted no hubiera decidido intervenir». {n}Abelard responde en tono irascible.{/n} «Recuerde a la Lord Capitán Theodora. ¿Cree que llegó a poner un solo pie en las cubiertas inferiores? No. Nunca. Dejaba esos asuntos a mi cargo y al de los oficiales más inexpertos mientras ella se dedicaba a progresar en sus grandes proyectos para el protectorado, como debería hacer todo buen estratega y {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Comerciante Independiente{/g}».
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: 「あなたが介入してこなければ、自分でこの状況を処理したのですが」{n}と、アベラルドはわずかに怒気をにじませながら言った。{/n}「ロード・キャプテン・シオドーラのことを思い出すのです。彼女が下層デッキに軽々しく足を踏み入れたと思われますか？いいえ、彼女はしませんでした。そのようなことは我と下級士官に任せ、彼女は保護領のための壮大な計画に専念していたのです…それこそが真の戦略家であり、{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}自由開拓者{/g}であるならば当然のことなのです」
languages.original_text: "I would have handled the situation myself had you not decided to intervene," {n}Abelard says irascibly.{/n} "Remember Lord Captain Theodora. Do you think she ever set one slippered foot on the lower decks? No. She did not. Such matters were left to myself and the junior officers while she dedicated herself to her grand designs for the protectorate — as any true strategist and {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g} ought."

traits.locale_text: 「あなたが介入してこなければ、自分でこの状況を処理したのですが」{n}と、アベラルドはわずかに怒気をにじませながら言った。{/n}「ロード・キャプテン・シオドーラのことを思い出すのです。彼女が下層デッキに軽々しく足を踏み入れたと思われますか？いいえ、彼女はしませんでした。そのようなことは我と下級士官に任せ、彼女は保護領のための壮大な計画に専念していたのです…それこそが真の戦略家であり、{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}自由開拓者{/g}であるならば当然のことなのです」
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "Ich hätte die Situation selbst geklärt, hättet Ihr nicht beschlossen, zu intervenieren"{n}, sagt Abelard gereizt.{/n} "Denkt an Lord Captain Theodora. Glaubt Ihr, sie hat je auch nur einen beslipperten Fuß auf die Unterdecks gesetzt? Nein. Das hat sie nicht. Solche Angelegenheiten wurden mir und den niederen Offizieren überlassen, während sie sich ihren großen Plänen für das Protektorat gewidmet hat — wie jeder wahre Stratege und {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Freihändler{/g} es tun sollte."
languages.original_text: "I would have handled the situation myself had you not decided to intervene," {n}Abelard says irascibly.{/n} "Remember Lord Captain Theodora. Do you think she ever set one slippered foot on the lower decks? No. She did not. Such matters were left to myself and the junior officers while she dedicated herself to her grand designs for the protectorate — as any true strategist and {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g} ought."

traits.locale_text: "Ich hätte die Situation selbst geklärt, hättet Ihr nicht beschlossen, zu intervenieren"{n}, sagt Abelard gereizt.{/n} "Denkt an Lord Captain Theodora. Glaubt Ihr, sie hat je auch nur einen beslipperten Fuß auf die Unterdecks gesetzt? Nein. Das hat sie nicht. Solche Angelegenheiten wurden mir und den niederen Offizieren überlassen, während sie sich ihren großen Plänen für das Protektorat gewidmet hat — wie jeder wahre Stratege und {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Freihändler{/g} es tun sollte."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: « J'aurais réglé le problème tout seul si vous n'aviez pas décidé de vous en mêler, {n}rétorque Abélard d'un ton indigné.{/n} Souvenez-vous de la seigneure-capitaine Théodora. S'est-elle jamais avisée de s'aventurer sur les ponts inférieurs ? Non, pas une seule fois. Sous son commandement, les officiers subalternes et moi-même nous occupions des affaires courantes pendant qu'elle se consacrait entièrement à l'avenir du protectorat, comme tout fin stratège et {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}libre-marchand{/g} digne de ce nom devrait le faire. »
languages.original_text: "I would have handled the situation myself had you not decided to intervene," {n}Abelard says irascibly.{/n} "Remember Lord Captain Theodora. Do you think she ever set one slippered foot on the lower decks? No. She did not. Such matters were left to myself and the junior officers while she dedicated herself to her grand designs for the protectorate — as any true strategist and {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g} ought."

traits.locale_text: « J'aurais réglé le problème tout seul si vous n'aviez pas décidé de vous en mêler, {n}rétorque Abélard d'un ton indigné.{/n} Souvenez-vous de la seigneure-capitaine Théodora. S'est-elle jamais avisée de s'aventurer sur les ponts inférieurs ? Non, pas une seule fois. Sous son commandement, les officiers subalternes et moi-même nous occupions des affaires courantes pendant qu'elle se consacrait entièrement à l'avenir du protectorat, comme tout fin stratège et {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}libre-marchand{/g} digne de ce nom devrait le faire. »
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "Araya girmeseydiniz meseleyi ben halledecektim." {n}Abelard, huysuzca söyleniyor.{/n} "Lord Kaptan Theodora'yı hatırlıyorsunuzdur. Alt güverteye ayak bastığını mı sanıyorsunuz? Hayır. Basmazdı. Böyle mevzuları bana ve alt kademedeki subaylara bırakırdı. Öte yandan kendini protektoraya adar, onun geleceğini düşünürdü. Gerçek bir stratejist ve {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Hür Tacir{/g} olmanın gereği budur."
languages.original_text: "I would have handled the situation myself had you not decided to intervene," {n}Abelard says irascibly.{/n} "Remember Lord Captain Theodora. Do you think she ever set one slippered foot on the lower decks? No. She did not. Such matters were left to myself and the junior officers while she dedicated herself to her grand designs for the protectorate — as any true strategist and {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g} ought."

traits.locale_text: "Araya girmeseydiniz meseleyi ben halledecektim." {n}Abelard, huysuzca söyleniyor.{/n} "Lord Kaptan Theodora'yı hatırlıyorsunuzdur. Alt güverteye ayak bastığını mı sanıyorsunuz? Hayır. Basmazdı. Böyle mevzuları bana ve alt kademedeki subaylara bırakırdı. Öte yandan kendini protektoraya adar, onun geleceğini düşünürdü. Gerçek bir strateji uzmanı ve {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Hür Tacir{/g} olmanın gereği bu."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion
